result.eng: He stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.
result.ga: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrud
result.orig: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrud
result.html: D'fhan sé ón ól b'in é an príomhrudHe stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟan sé ón ól b'in é an príoṁrudHe stayed away from the drink, that was the main thing.

result.eng: The affair was main news in the established media for over a week.
result.ga: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaine
result.orig: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaine
result.html: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaineThe affair was main news in the established media for over a week.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an cás ina ṗríoṁscéal ag na meáin ḟadḃunaiṫe ar feaḋ breis is seaċtaineThe affair was main news in the established media for over a week.
